nodes.text: A B1 battle droid served in the droid army of the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. He was stationed on the bridge of a Munificent-class star frigate during the Ambush on Rugosa.

When a space battle ensued above the planet Rugosa in 22 BBY, this battle droid was ordered to shoot down Jedi General Yoda's Consular-class cruiser. The droid also tried to shoot down the escape pod containing Yoda, but failed doing so.
Like all B1 battle droids, he stood at 1.93 meters tall and had masculine programing. He sported bone-white colored plating and was equipped with an E-5 blaster rifle.

His first and only appearance was in "Ambush", the first episode of the animated television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' first season, which originally aired on October 3, 2008. He was voiced by Matthew Wood.
